CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1i Figure 4 shows the J-V ( a ) and J 1 / 2 -V ( b ) characteristics of the PBDT-TDPP-S devices with a hole - only device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / active layer ( varied thickness ) / MoO 3 / Al(100 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS (40 nm) |
| Active layer (varied thickness) |
| MoO3 |
| Al(100 nm) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS (40 nm) |
| Active layer |
| MoO3 |
| Al(100 nm) |

Note: "varied thickness" is not a material, but a property of the "active layer".

The entities "ITO" and "PEDOT : PSS (40 nm)" are not material properties, but rather materials used in the device fabrication. Therefore, they have been removed from the list.
